featured.text: In addition, smiles signal to others that we are people who might be nice to talk to and work with—and that can help us make friends.

definition.zh_def: 加法；增加的部分或數量
definition.en_def: The process of adding something to something else; an increase.
definition.example: The addition of new features improved the software significantly.
